Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add knowledge dimension support to question generation API

- Added 6 knowledge dimensions: definition, example, comparison, scenario, implementation, troubleshooting
- Each dimension targets different learning perspectives and appropriate Bloom levels
- Added dimension parameter validation with default to ''definition''
- Integrated dimension instructions into Grok prompt generation
- Updated response to include dimension metadata
- Enhanced logging to show both Bloom level and dimension used

EOF
)")

Fix build error by excluding Deno edge functions from TypeScript compilation

- Added supabase/functions to tsconfig.json exclude list
- Prevents TypeScript from trying to compile Deno-specific imports
